title: Covid-19: Mizoram to close schools for students of class 8 and below
description: Mizoram will close down schools for students of class eight and below following a spike in Covid-19 cases due to the second wave of the virus in the state, a new guideline issued by the state government which came into effect on Saturday said. Schools for students of classes five to eight were reopened on March 1 and for classes three and four on April 1. Public interview for ministers has been suspended, for the time being, the guideline issued on Friday night said.
